title: Smartphone-Integrated College Mathematics and English Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of secondary-level mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Customized English education focusing on mathematics terminology, considering workplace applicability for working professionals

learning_goals: Produce and upload at least three English presentation videos explaining mathematical concepts using specialized terminology to YouTube.
Achieve 100% completion of group topic maps using MindMeister.
Accurately use at least 80% of key vocabulary after watching math concept explanation videos.
Revise and submit the final project report incorporating peer feedback.

resources: Free Basic Versions of YouTube & MindMeister (No Paid Accounts Required)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
